guest_message: Hi there! This is Alex. I'm looking to place an order for a vegan Margherita Pizza. Could you make sure it's a small 10" with a thin crust? Also, just want to double-check that everything's vegan-friendly with this option. No cross-contamination or animal products, right?

Hey there! Yes, I'd love the Margherita Pizza as a small 10" with a thin crust, and definitely make it with vegan cheese instead. No fresh mozzarella for me. 

I'm good with just the pizza, no extra toppings, thanks! Could you also make sure there’s no cross-contamination with animal products, please? Oh, and the name for the order is Alex Turner. 

How much will that be? Thanks!

It looks like the order is almost set, but I want to make sure it matches what I need exactly. Can we adjust it to just say "Margherita Pizza" on the order and include a "Size" modifier as "Small 10\"" and a "Crust Type" as "Thin Crust"? That would be great! Thank you for accommodating.

Hi, it's Alex Turner here! I see there's a little extra with the vegan cheese on the Margerita Pizza. Could it be possible to leave out the cheese entirely? Just want to stick exactly to how I planned it, thanks!

Hey there! It looks like the Margherita Pizza currently includes vegan cheese, but I actually need it without any cheese at all. Could you update that, please? Everything else looks perfect. Just making sure it's totally vegan-friendly, you know?

Once that's sorted, I think we're all good. Just checking, will it still be $16.99 without the cheese?

It looks like my order isn't quite right yet. Could you please remove the "No cheese" modifier and ensure it aligns with my target order of a Small 10" Margherita Pizza with Thin Crust? Everything needs to be vegan-friendly and prepared away from any animal products, as previously discussed. I appreciate your help!

Hmm, it looks like you've got the Margherita Pizza down as vegan with no cheese, which is great! Just a quick check, I noticed that in my target order there isn't a required "No Cheese" modifier. Let’s go ahead and just double-check that it's clear for vegan requirements without needing a mandatory option for cheese. Can you ensure the pizza's prepared vegan by default? Thanks for your attention to those details!
Great, it looks like everything is set for the Margherita Pizza with the vegan specifications I requested. Thanks for ensuring the details are right! I'll see you soon for pickup.
